clang-analyzer-unix.Malloc.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-unix.Malloc
Check for memory leaks, double free, and use-after-free problems. Traces memory
managed by malloc()/free().
The
clang-analyzer-unix.Malloc
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-unix.Malloc.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
